title: Motley Fool Money: 08.13.2010
description: On this week's Motley Fool Money, we share some of our favorite interviews. Jonah Lehrer talks about How We Decide.  Dan Ariely talks about the Upside of Irrationality.  And Christopher Chabris talks Invisible Gorillas.
content:encoded: On this week's Motley Fool Money, we share some of our favorite interviews. Jonah Lehrer talks about How We Decide.  Dan Ariely talks about the Upside of Irrationality.  And Christopher Chabris talks Invisible Gorillas.
